LegalDisclaimer.title: Please confirm before proceeding
LegalDisclaimer.text: To maintain the integrity of our community and the spirit of fair use, we ask you to confirm two important points:
LegalDisclaimer.ticket: I own a valid ticket for my journey.
LegalDisclaimer.ticketDescription: I understand that this app is designed to improve awareness and planning in public transport, not to circumvent rules or regulations.
LegalDisclaimer.activeUsage: I am not actively using the app during my journey.
LegalDisclaimer.activeUsageDescription: I understand that the active use of the app during my journey can disturb other passengers and violate the terms of use of the public transport operator.

FeedbackModal.title: Send your feedback to:
FeedbackModal.about-us-text: FreiFahren is a non-commercial open-source project aimed at making public transport more accessible. We are always open to new contributors on our
FeedbackModal.telegram-group-info: Most of the reports come from the FreiFahren_BE Telegram group. Thank you to the admins for allowing us to extract the relevant information with our Telegram bot.
